Text: Thankyou for posting this nice and comic documentary. See you all at the 3`th season.

There is no end to my love for this show. First season was great (except that the last two episodes were kind of strung out for the sake of drama, but I guess that's the price you pay for having a successful show).

Can't wait to see this season, thanks.
Thank you soooo much...will anyone be upping Season 3? I really need it. I have parts of it (to whomever upped it before).
Is this the Brit version, or the American version narrated by Sean Astin?
